content.data: • Added popup to let users choose a nickname

• Added functionality to Login Popup
• Added funtionality to Verify Email Popup
• Requests to resent verify codes can now be sent
• Verify codes can now be submitted

• Increased margins on popup windows to allow breathing room for the scrollbar
• Added popup to allow users to verify their emails
• Fixed the register popup window's state update

• Added funtionality to the Register popup window
• Fixed a bug where empty space was being shown in popups

• Version is now passed down properly from the Wrapper
• Added support for high resolution wallpapers
• Added a settings popup with options to toggle high resolution wallpapers and stage quality
• APaper popup now renders text contents and has a title element
• Fixed a bug where queued popups wouldn't clear
• Added a settings button to the browser
• Version ID and Version UID are now displayed in settings popup
• Other minor tweaks and fixes
• Dynamic Pan Image components now save their source so they only load once

• Added dynamic pan image button component
• Added a close button to various popups
• Added the splash page
• Added a Page component

• Fine tuned the loading process
• Implemented popups in the browser component

• Cleanued up language files
• Added a BulkLoader

• Added visible version number to loading screen
• Implemented navigation bar, user bar and task bar

• Migrated old Client code over
• Added Stickers and Backgrounds
• Login and Registration windows now extend the BaseModal class
• Added a Checkbox Component 
• Dynamic Pan Image Component now accepts Bitmaps as its source as well as URLs, same way a Spark Image component does
